CustomField.formula: LEFT( IF ( INCLUDES ( MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__Resource_Skill_Set__c , "Customer Support" ), "Customer Support; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__Resource_Skill_Set__c , "Project Management" ), "Project Management; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__Resource_Skill_Set__c , "Technical" ), "Technical; ", null ), LEN(IF ( INCLUDES ( MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__Resource_Skill_Set__c , "Customer Support" ), "Customer Support; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__Resource_Skill_Set__c , "Project Management" ), "Project Management; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( MPM4_BASE__Resource__r.MPM4_BASE__Resource_Skill_Set__c , "Technical" ), "Technical; ", null ))-2 )
CustomField.label: Resource Skill Set
